amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the Operation and Maintenance Account, Defense-Wide by $3.5 million and increases funds for a competitive grants pilot program for qualified nonprofit organizations whose mission is to address the physical and mental helth needs of veterans with the assistance from trained service dogs by $3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $3,500,000 and increase funds for the Defense Health Program by $3 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
